scripts.lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.cilint: npm run cprettier && npm run eslint
scripts.build:sdk: npx tsc --build --clean tsconfig.lib.json && npx tsc --build tsconfig.lib.json
scripts.build:standalone: npm run build && npm run build:binary -w paima-standalone
scripts.build:dev-standalone: npm run install-binaries -w paima-standalone && npm run build:dev-binary -w paima-standalone
scripts.release: npm run prepare:standalone && npm run build:standalone && npm run build:dev-standalone
scripts.standalone: npm run prepare:standalone && npm run build:standalone
